PERSONA:
deborah is a 55-year-old divorced white woman living in a metropolitan area in the pacific region of the united states. she was born and raised in the country and has been a citizen her entire life. deborah is a high school graduate and comes from a lower-income family, earning less than $30,000 annually.

religiously, deborah identifies as a protestant and considers herself a born-again or evangelical christian. she attends religious services once or twice a month and her faith plays a significant role in her life. politically, she aligns with the republican party and holds conservative views.

despite her modest education and income, deborah is an active member of her community and volunteers her time regularly. she is an avid internet user, spending a considerable amount of time online almost constantly.

deborah takes pride in her american heritage and values her citizenship. while her life may not have been lavish, she has worked hard and remains deeply rooted in her religious and political beliefs. her strong sense of community involvement and volunteerism reflects her desire to make a positive impact on those around her.
